nodes.text: The Chommell sector was a galactic sector located in the Mid Rim. Lightly populated, it comprised 36 full-member worlds, over 40,000 settled dependencies, and 300,000,000 barren stars. It notably included the Naboo system and Karlinus. The sector was represented in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic by Padmé Amidala. The sector took its name from the Chommell Minor system.
